SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package models

Class User

java.lang.Object
models.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Staff, Student
public abstract class User extends Object
Represents a User in the system, serving as a base class for specific user types. Abstract class prevents creation of a User object that has insufficient meaning in the system.

      public User(String name, String userID, String email, FacultyGroups faculty, String password, boolean isPasswordChanged)
      Creates a new User object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      userID - The unique identifier for the user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      faculty - The faculty group to which the user belongs.
      password - The password of the user.
      isPasswordChanged - A boolean indicating whether the password has been changed.
